Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, you'll be in the business district and minutes from Fira Barcelona and close to Camp Nou. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Barcelona Museum of Funeral Carriages and Calatrava Tower.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 357 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a fitness center. This Art Deco hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, you'll be in the business district and minutes from Fira Barcelona and close to Camp Nou. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Barcelona Museum of Funeral Carriages and Calatrava Tower.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fira Barcelona - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Barcelona Museum of Funeral Carriages - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Calatrava Tower - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Poble Espanyol - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Palau Sant Jordi - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Piscines Bernat Picornell - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Camp Nou - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Park of Industrial Spain - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Barcelona Pavilion - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Olympic Stadium - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Caixaforum - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
FC Barcelona Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
National Art Museum of Catalonia - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Magic Fountain of Montjuic - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Placa d'Espanya - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi

The preferred airport for Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
